install.name: Simple File Upload v1.1
install.author: Anders Wasen
install.description: A simple upload module. Will allow a user to upload a file to the given folder fetched from the parameter settings.

param.name: upload_location
param.label: Default Upload Location
param.description: This is the folder where uploaded files are placed if there are no user directories given below

param.name: upload_maxsize
param.label: Max. Upload Size (bytes)
param.description: This is the maximum allowed upload file size in bytes

param.name: upload_bgcolor
param.label: Pop-up background color
param.description: The background color of the information pop-up

param.name: upload_capthca
param.label: Use Captcha
param.description: Force the user to add a Captcha code to be able to upload.

param.name: upload_multi
param.label: Allow multiple upload
param.description: Allow user to add files dymamically and upload at the same time.

param.name: upload_email
param.label: Send e-mail at upload
param.description: If you want an e-mail confirmation sent out when there is a new upload enter the e-mail address here (use comma between addresses to add more than one). Leave it blank to not send e-mail.

param.name: upload_emailmsg
param.label: Show 'message sent' to user
param.description: Write 'message sent' on pop-up so user knows Admin has been notified.

param.name: upload_fileexist
param.label: If file exist
param.description: Operation to take incase the uploaded file already exists. Backup - Copies to old file with a new name (adds date); Replace - Removes the existing file; Fail - Notify user the upload failed due to existing file.

param.name: upload_filetypes
param.label: Allowed filetypes (separate by semi-colon). Asterisk (*) allows any type.
param.description: This is a list of allowed filetypes (separated by semi-colon). Put a [*] (asterisk) to allow any type.

param.name: settingids
param.label: Allowed users
param.description: This is a list of users allowed to upload files.
